title: Can't change region
body:
I would like to change my region from EUW to EUNE but i can't , i have same username on eune as on euw is it a problem? 
i even bought name change and changed it to lumipallot cuz im using same name on eune "kejemlove" Still have an error.[](https://p6.zdusercontent.com/attachment/43400/0Jfty4h1ASyKyoMe1H4xX9OkE?token=eyJhbGciOiJkaXIiLCJlbmMiOiJBMTI4Q0JDLUhTMjU2In0..G1kV6fFlUxTIAXOKdU57Lw.HFwOiZtRjglHVid0kDzoNzlLDNmFlo-0sScMt9t1uyB95YhT89bKZll7M-WldivYJ6NSSTsoB7xZ-YPP88MerYVNaOQw6H0t17yJepFnoljRs_HAKvhtfKIOlRyHS4Fm6VX0Tqb7PTNaBDUeoun-IMtS_dwRNpMEdjzcFZp0CEkp2mjsM4xRm_MDsX7NQJUJCBb9bDdIKmYFNFBdCkW8a3G-CcMm5XWMDSgLAK6YFXmCebRnqbTjCBfv6D5DLMMfUaIADVbFDMUcoercZdJEE7UvYufi9R212qYcwdVj-80.1wjYHiyvxP_16yG1ZXp0iw)

replies.body:
I can´t switch from euw to eune i´m so disapointed cuz i wanted to switch server for then i could play with my bff did i delect while there´s preseason? or what please answer me really need it to work

OneLastInsec signs out
Ah, this helps thank you!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our account team can look into adding the name manually if it's available!
I want to change too. Is there any way I can keep my skins/progress?

If the username on the destination region is taken, you will be prompted to select a new username after the transfer has completed.  Or did you mean Summoner Name?  To better understand what's happening exactly, are there any specific error messages that you're getting?
